turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I wanted to order a coffee from Starbucks, can you help me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I can do that

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, my account should be saved to the computer. I want to order from the one by my house

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me look it up

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is it 2704 SE Santiam HWY Albany, OR 97322

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted an Americano

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you want in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A splash of Almond milk, and 5 Stevias please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me put that it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is placed, it'll be $3.50 at the Starbucks on Santiam

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, how long before it will be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: About 15 minutes, is there anything else you need.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That was all, thank you for your help. Have a good day

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, you too.
